text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplaySynonymNederlands (Nederland) (Dutch (Netherlands), nl)HCIM ProbleemStatusCodelijst to Condition Clinical Status Codes
    55561003ActiveActueelActueel~active
    >recurrence(When problem is recurring, it is active, but recurrence also tells you there has been a period of inactivity before. Recurrence thus provides more context than just 'active'.)
    73425007InactiveNiet actueelNiet actueel~inactive
    >remission(When problem is in remission, it is considered inactive, but remission gives more context on the expectation of the problem returning. Remission thus provides more context than just 'inactive'.)
    >resolved(When problem is resolved, it is considered inactive, but resolved gives more context on the expectation of the problem returning. Resolved thus provides more context than just 'inactive'.)

name: ProbleemStatusCodelijst
title: ProbleemStatusCodelijst
